statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-14 \, x^{3} + 13 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 14 , -3 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , 5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 2 , 3 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 4 , -3 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
